stdout:
Table	Create Table
shifts	CREATE TABLE `shifts` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `siteName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('active','completed','cancelled') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `startTimeUtc` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `endTimeUtc` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `durationMinutes` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `liveToken` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `pairCode` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pairCodeExpiresAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `staffName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `shifts_liveToken_unique` (`liveToken`),
  UNIQUE KEY `shifts_pairCode_unique` (`pairCode`),
  KEY `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `liveToken_idx` (`liveToken`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=750001
